title: Boeing to debut 777-9 jet at Wings India 2024, Air India buys 10
paragraph:
HYDERABAD - Boeing (NYSE:BA) is poised to unveil its widebody 777-9 jet at the upcoming Wings India 2024 event in Hyderabad, marking a significant milestone for the aerospace giant and the Indian aviation sector. The twin-engine model, designed for international routes, has already seen a substantial order from Air India, which has purchased ten of these jets to bolster its fleet.
The premiere of the 777-9 jet at Wings India 2024 offers the public and industry insiders a first-hand look at Boeing's latest offering in the competitive long-haul market. This move comes alongside Boeing's announcement of a $100 million investment in India's aviation infrastructure. The investment aims to enhance pilot training and other critical aspects of aviation, reflecting the company's commitment to supporting the growth of air travel in the country.
